trans-unit.source: Meal data from the Health database is used to determine glucose effects. Glucose data from the Health database is used for graphing and momentum calculation. Sleep data from the Health database is used to optimize delivery of Apple Watch complication updates during the time you are awake.
trans-unit.target: Mahlzeitendaten aus der Health Datenbank werden verwendet, um die Glukoseeffekte zu bestimmen. Glukosedaten aus der Health Datenbank werden zur grafischen Darstellung und Impulsberechnung verwendet. Schlafdaten aus der Health-Datenbank werden verwendet, um die Bereitstellung von Apple Watch-Komplikationsupdates während Ihrer Wachzeit zu optimieren.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Share Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Bluetooth is used to communicate with insulin pump and continuous glucose monitor devices.
trans-unit.target: Bluetooth wird verwendet, um mit Insulinpumpen und kontinuierlichen Blutzuckermessgeräten zu kommunizieren.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Bluetooth Always Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Bluetooth is used to communicate with insulin pump and continuous glucose monitor devices.
trans-unit.target: Bluetooth wird verwendet, um mit Insulinpumpen und kontinuierlichen Blutzuckermessgeräten zu kommunizieren.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Bluetooth Peripheral Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Camera is used to scan barcodes of devices
trans-unit.target: Kamera wird verwendet, um Barcodes von Geräten zu scannen
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Face ID is used to authenticate insulin bolus and to save changes to therapy settings.
trans-unit.target: Face ID wird verwendet, um Insulinbolus zu authentifizieren und Änderungen an den Therapieeinstellungen zu speichern.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Meal data from the Health database is used to determine glucose effects. Glucose data from the Health database is used for graphing and momentum calculation. Sleep data from the Health database is used to improve the Apple Watch complication.
trans-unit.target: Mahlzeit-Daten aus der HealthKit-Datenbank werden verwendet, um Blutzuckereffekte zu bestimmen. Blutzuckerdaten aus der HealthKit-Datenbank werden für die Grafik- und Impulsberechnung verwendet.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Share Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Carbohydrate meal data entered in the app and on the watch is stored in the Health database. Glucose data retrieved from the CGM is stored securely in HealthKit.
trans-unit.target: Die in der App und auf der Uhr eingegebenen Kohlenhydratmengen werden in der Health-Datenbank gespeichert. Blutzuckerdaten, die vom CGM abgerufen werden, werden sicher in HealthKit gespeichert.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Update Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Loop uses Siri to allow you to set override presets with your voice.
trans-unit.target: Loop verwendet Siri, damit Sie Override-Voreinstellungen mit Ihrer Stimme festlegen können.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Siri Usage Description

trans-unit.id: Critical Alerts will always play a sound and appear on the Lock screen even if your iPhone is muted or Do Not Disturb is on.
trans-unit.source: Critical Alerts will always play a sound and appear on the Lock screen even if your iPhone is muted or Do Not Disturb is on.
trans-unit.target: Kritische Warnungen werden immer einen Ton abspielen und auf dem Sperrbildschirm erscheinen, auch wenn Ihr iPhone stumm ist oder "Nicht stören" aktiviert ist.
trans-unit.note: Manage Notifications in Settings descriptive text

trans-unit.id:
Notifications appear on your Lock screen or pop up while you’re using other apps.
Notifications give you important (appName) app information without requiring you to open the app. You can customize when and how you want to receive these notifications.
trans-unit.source:
Notifications appear on your Lock screen or pop up while you’re using other apps.
Notifications give you important (appName) app information without requiring you to open the app. You can customize when and how you want to receive these notifications.
trans-unit.target:
Benachrichtigungen erscheinen auf Ihrem Sperrbildschirm oder erscheinen während Sie andere Apps verwenden.
Benachrichtigungen geben Ihnen wichtige (appName) App-Informationen, ohne dass Sie die App öffnen müssen. Sie können anpassen, wann und wie Sie diese Benachrichtigungen erhalten möchten.
trans-unit.note: Manage Notifications in Settings descriptive text

trans-unit.id: %1$@ is operating with Closed Loop in the OFF position. Your pump and CGM will continue operating, but your basal insulin will not adjust automatically.
trans-unit.source: %1$@ is operating with Closed Loop in the OFF position. Your pump and CGM will continue operating, but your basal insulin will not adjust automatically.
trans-unit.target: %1$@ arbeitet mit Closed Loop in der OFF-Position. Ihre Pumpe und CGM werden weiterhin in Betrieb sein, aber Ihr Basalinsulin wird sich nicht automatisch anpassen.
trans-unit.note: Alert message for closed loop off informational modal. (1: app name)

trans-unit.id: %1$@ is unable to communicate with your insulin pump. The app will continue trying to reach your pump, but insulin delivery information cannot be updated and no automation can continue. You can wait several minutes to see if the issue resolves or tap the button below to learn more about other options.
trans-unit.source: %1$@ is unable to communicate with your insulin pump. The app will continue trying to reach your pump, but insulin delivery information cannot be updated and no automation can continue. You can wait several minutes to see if the issue resolves or tap the button below to learn more about other options.
trans-unit.target: %1$@ kann nicht mit Ihrer Insulinpumpe kommunizieren. Die App wird weiterhin versuchen, Ihre Pumpe zu erreichen, aber Insulin-Lieferinformationen können nicht aktualisiert werden und keine Automatisierung kann fortgesetzt werden. Sie können einige Minuten warten, um zu sehen, ob das Problem behoben ist, oder tippen Sie auf die Schaltfläche unten, um mehr über andere Optionen zu erfahren.
trans-unit.note: Message for alert shown when delivery status is uncertain. (1: app name)

trans-unit.note: Notice message when recommending bolus when BG is below the glucose safety limit. (1: glucose value)

trans-unit.id: Predicted glucose of %1$@ is below your suspend threshold setting.
trans-unit.source: Predicted glucose of %1$@ is below your suspend threshold setting.
trans-unit.target: Die vorhergesagte Glukose von %1$@ liegt unter dem Grenzwert für die Hypo-Abschaltung.
trans-unit.note: Notice message when recommending bolus when BG is below the suspend threshold. (1: glucose value)
Format string describing retrospective glucose prediction comparison. (1: Predicted glucose)(2: Actual glucose)(3: difference)

Title of insulin model preset

The title of the cell displaying a recommended temp basal value

The title of the notification action to retry a bolus command

Button text to save carbs and/or manual glucose entry without a bolus

trans-unit.id: Tap here to set up a CGM
trans-unit.source: Tap here to set up a CGM
trans-unit.target: Tippen Sie hier, um ein CGM einzurichten
trans-unit.note: Descriptive text for button to add CGM device

trans-unit.id: Tap here to set up a Service
trans-unit.source: Tap here to set up a Service
trans-unit.target: Tippen Sie hier, um einen Dienst einzurichten
trans-unit.note: The descriptive text of the add service button in settings

trans-unit.id: Tap here to set up a pump
trans-unit.source: Tap here to set up a pump
trans-unit.target: Tippen Sie hier, um eine Pumpe einzurichten
trans-unit.note: Descriptive text for button to add pump device
The subtitle of the cell displaying an action to add a manually measurement glucose value
The subtitle of the cell displaying an action to resume insulin delivery
Message presented in the status row instructing the user to tap this row to stop a bolus

trans-unit.id: The adverse event report URL could not be constructed properly.
trans-unit.source: The adverse event report URL could not be constructed properly.
trans-unit.target: Die URL des unerwünschten Ereignisberichts konnte nicht ordnungsgemäß erstellt werden.
trans-unit.note: Alert message when the adverse event report URL cannot be constructed properly.

trans-unit.id: The bolus recommendation has updated. Please reconfirm the bolus amount.
trans-unit.source: The bolus recommendation has updated. Please reconfirm the bolus amount.
trans-unit.target: Die Bolus-Empfehlung wurde aktualisiert. Bitte bestätigen Sie den Boluseintrag erneut.
trans-unit.note: Alert message for an updated bolus recommendation

trans-unit.id: The legacy model used by Loop, allowing customization of action duration.
trans-unit.source: The legacy model used by Loop, allowing customization of action duration.
trans-unit.target: Das herkömmliche von Loop verwendete Modell, welches die Anpassung der Wirkungsdauer ermöglicht.
trans-unit.note: Subtitle description of Walsh insulin model setting

trans-unit.id: The maximum allowed amount is %1$@ grams
trans-unit.source: The maximum allowed amount is %1$@ grams
trans-unit.target: Die maximal zulässige Menge beträgt %1$@ Gramm
trans-unit.note: Alert body displayed for quantity greater than max (1: maximum quantity in grams)

trans-unit.id: The maximum bolus amount is %1$@ U.
trans-unit.source: The maximum bolus amount is %1$@ U.
trans-unit.note: Format string for maximum bolus exceeded alert (1: maximumBolusAmount)

trans-unit.id: The maximum bolus amount is %@ U.
trans-unit.source: The maximum bolus amount is %@ U.
trans-unit.note: Alert message for a maximum bolus validation error (1: max bolus value)

trans-unit.id: The maximum bolus amount is %@ Units
trans-unit.source: The maximum bolus amount is %@ Units
trans-unit.note: Body of the alert describing a maximum bolus validation error. (1: The localized max bolus value)

trans-unit.id: The maximum bolus setting must be configured before a bolus can be delivered.
trans-unit.source: The maximum bolus setting must be configured before a bolus can be delivered.
trans-unit.target: Die maximale Bolusmenge muss konfiguriert werden, bevor ein Bolus geliefert werden kann.
trans-unit.note: Alert message for a missing maximum bolus setting error
Title text for button to Therapy Settings
Title of the carb entry date picker cell
Time change alert title
Critical event log export error alert try again button

trans-unit.id: Turn on Bluetooth to receive alerts, alarms or sensor glucose readings.
trans-unit.source: Turn on Bluetooth to receive alerts, alarms or sensor glucose readings.
trans-unit.target: Aktivieren Sie Bluetooth, um Warnungen, Alarme oder Sensor-Werte zu empfangen.
trans-unit.note: Bluetooth off foreground alert body
The short unit display string for international units of insulin
Title for alert shown when delivery status is uncertain
Alert title for a carb entry persistence error

trans-unit.id: Unable to Save Manual Glucose Entry
trans-unit.source: Unable to Save Manual Glucose Entry
trans-unit.target: Manuelle Blutzuckereingabe kann nicht gespeichert werden
trans-unit.note: Alert title for a manual glucose entry persistence error

trans-unit.id: Unable to stop the bolus in progress. Move your iPhone closer to the pump and try again. Check your insulin delivery history for details, and monitor your glucose closely.
trans-unit.source: Unable to stop the bolus in progress. Move your iPhone closer to the pump and try again. Check your insulin delivery history for details, and monitor your glucose closely.
trans-unit.target: Der Bolus kann nicht gestoppt werden. Bewegen Sie Ihr iPhone näher an die Pumpe und versuchen Sie es erneut. Überprüfen Sie Ihre Insulin-Lieferhistorie für Details, und überwachen Sie Ihren Blutzucker genau.
trans-unit.note: The alert body for an error while canceling a bolus
The default description to use when an entry has no dose description
The title of a target alert action specifying pre-meal targets duration for 1 hour or until the user enters carbs (whichever comes first).
The title of a target alert action specifying workout targets duration until it is turned off by the user
The title of the alert controller used to select a duration for pre-meal targets
The title of the alert controller used to select a duration for workout targets
The title of the alert controller used to select a duration for workout targets
Title of insulin model setting

trans-unit.id: When current or forecasted glucose is below the glucose safety limit, Loop will not recommend a bolus, and will always recommend a temporary basal rate of 0 units per hour.
trans-unit.source: When current or forecasted glucose is below the glucose safety limit, Loop will not recommend a bolus, and will always recommend a temporary basal rate of 0 units per hour.
trans-unit.target: Wenn der aktuelle oder prognostizierte Blutzucker unter der Blutzucker-Sicherheitsgrenze liegt, wird Loop keinen Bolus empfehlen und immer eine temporäre Basalrate von 0 Einheiten pro Stunde empfehlen.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of glucose safety limit

trans-unit.id: When current or forecasted glucose is below the suspend threshold, Loop will not recommend a bolus, and will always recommend a temporary basal rate of 0 units per hour.
trans-unit.source: When current or forecasted glucose is below the suspend threshold, Loop will not recommend a bolus, and will always recommend a temporary basal rate of 0 units per hour.
trans-unit.target: Wenn die aktuelle oder prognostizierte Glukose unter dem Wert für die Hypo-Abschaltung liegt, empfiehlt Loop immer eine temporäre Basalrate von 0 Einheiten pro Stunde und - wenn kein gesonderter Bolusgrenzwert definiert ist - auch keinen Bolus.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of suspend threshold

trans-unit.id: When out of Closed Loop mode, the app uses a simplified bolus calculator like a typical pump.
trans-unit.source: When out of Closed Loop mode, the app uses a simplified bolus calculator like a typical pump.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie nicht im Closed Loop-Modus sind, verwendet die App einen vereinfachten Bolus-Rechner wie eine typische Pumpe.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
The label of the workout mode toggle button
Workout override still on reminder alert title

trans-unit.id: Workout Temp Adjust has been turned on for more than 24 hours. Make sure you still want it enabled, or turn it off in the app.
trans-unit.source: Workout Temp Adjust has been turned on for more than 24 hours. Make sure you still want it enabled, or turn it off in the app.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitäts-Anpassung wurde seit mehr als 24 Stunden eingeschaltet. Stellen Sie sicher, dass sie weiterhin aktiviert werden soll, oder deaktivieren Sie es in der App.
trans-unit.note: Workout override still on reminder alert body.

trans-unit.id: Your glucose is below or predicted to go below your glucose safety limit, %@.
trans-unit.source: Your glucose is below or predicted to go below your glucose safety limit, %@.
trans-unit.target: Ihr Blutzucker ist unter Ihrem Blutzucker-Sicherheitsgrenzwert oder wird vorausgesagt darunter gehen, %@.
trans-unit.note: Caption for bolus screen notice when no bolus is recommended due to prediction dropping below glucose safety limit

trans-unit.id: Your glucose is below your glucose safety limit, %1$@.
trans-unit.source: Your glucose is below your glucose safety limit, %1$@.
trans-unit.target: Ihr Blutzucker liegt unter Ihrem Sicherheitsgrenzwert, %1$@.
trans-unit.note: Format string for bolus screen notice when no bolus is recommended due input value below glucose safety limit. (1: suspendThreshold)

trans-unit.id: Your glucose is rapidly rising. Check that any carbs you've eaten were logged. If you logged carbs, check that the time you entered lines up with when you started eating.
trans-unit.source: Your glucose is rapidly rising. Check that any carbs you've eaten were logged. If you logged carbs, check that the time you entered lines up with when you started eating.
trans-unit.target: Ihr Blutzucker steigt rapide an. Überprüfen Sie, ob alle Kohlenhydrate, die Sie gegessen haben, protokolliert wurden. Wenn Sie alle Kohlenhydrate protokolliert haben, überprüfen Sie, ob die Zeit, die Sie eingegeben haben, mit dem Zeitpunkt übereinstimmt, wann Sie mit dem Essen begonnen haben.
trans-unit.note: Warning to ensure the carb entry is accurate

trans-unit.id:
Your phone’s time has been changed. %1$@ needs accurate time records to make predictions about your glucose and adjust your insulin accordingly.
Check in your iPhone Settings (General / Date & Time) and verify that Set Automatically is enabled. Failure to resolve could lead to serious under-delivery or over-delivery of insulin.
trans-unit.source:
Your phone’s time has been changed. %1$@ needs accurate time records to make predictions about your glucose and adjust your insulin accordingly.
Check in your iPhone Settings (General / Date & Time) and verify that Set Automatically is enabled. Failure to resolve could lead to serious under-delivery or over-delivery of insulin.
trans-unit.target:
Die Uhrzeit Ihres Telefons wurde geändert. %1$@ benötigt genaue Zeitaufzeichnungen, um Vorhersagen über Ihre Glukose zu treffen und Ihr Insulin entsprechend anzupassen.
Prüfen Sie Ihre iPhone-Einstellungen (Allgemein / Datum & Uhrzeit) und überprüfen Sie, ob Automatisch festlegen aktiviert ist. Ansonsten kann es zu einer schweren Unter- oder Überlieferung von Insulin führen.
trans-unit.note: Time change alert body. (1: app name)

trans-unit.id: Your pump data is stale. Loop cannot recommend a bolus amount.
trans-unit.source: Your pump data is stale. Loop cannot recommend a bolus amount.
trans-unit.target: Ihre Pumpendaten sind veraltet. Loop kann keine Bolusmenge empfehlen.
trans-unit.note: Caption for bolus screen notice when pump data is missing or stale

trans-unit.source: Future glucose is predicted by combining the effects of multiple inputs. Use this tool to toggle various inputs to see how they compare to the final prediction.
trans-unit.target: Der Blutzuckerverlauf wird vorhergesagt, indem die Effekte mehrerer Eingaben kombiniert werden. Verwenden Sie dieses Tool, um verschiedene Eingaben ein- und auszuschalten, um zu sehen, wie sie die Vorhersage beeinflussen.

trans-unit.id:
%1$@ has not completed a loop successfully in over 15 minutes.
Tap your CGM and insulin pump status icons for more information. %1$@ will continue trying to complete a loop, but check for potential communication issues with your pump and CGM.
trans-unit.source:
%1$@ has not completed a loop successfully in over 15 minutes.
Tap your CGM and insulin pump status icons for more information. %1$@ will continue trying to complete a loop, but check for potential communication issues with your pump and CGM.
trans-unit.target:
%1$@ hat einen Loop innert mehr als 15 Minuten nicht erfolgreich abgeschlossen.
Tippen Sie auf Ihre CGM- und Insulinpumpenstatussymbole, um weitere Informationen zu erhalten. %1$@ wird weiterhin versuchen, einen Loop abzuschließen, aber prüfen Sie mögliche Kommunikationsprobleme mit Ihrer Pumpe und CGM.
trans-unit.note: Red loop message (1: app name) (2: app name)

trans-unit.id:
%1$@ has not completed a loop successfully in the past 5-15 minutes.
Tap your CGM and insulin pump status icons for more information. %2$@ will continue trying to complete a loop, but watch for potential communication issues with your pump and CGM.
trans-unit.source:
%1$@ has not completed a loop successfully in the past 5-15 minutes.
Tap your CGM and insulin pump status icons for more information. %2$@ will continue trying to complete a loop, but watch for potential communication issues with your pump and CGM.
trans-unit.target:
%1$@ hat in den letzten 5-15 Minuten keinen Loop erfolgreich abgeschlossen.
Tippen Sie auf Ihre CGM- und Insulinpumpenstatussymbole, um weitere Informationen zu erhalten. %2$@ wird weiterhin versuchen, einen Loop zu vervollständigen, aber achten Sie auf mögliche Kommunikationsprobleme mit Ihrer Pumpe und CGM.
trans-unit.note: Yellow loop message (1: app name) (2: app name)

trans-unit.id:
%1$@ is operating with Closed Loop in the OFF position. Your pump and CGM will continue operating, but your basal insulin will not adjust automatically.
Tap Settings to toggle Closed Loop ON if you wish for the app to automate your insulin.
trans-unit.source:
%1$@ is operating with Closed Loop in the OFF position. Your pump and CGM will continue operating, but your basal insulin will not adjust automatically.
Tap Settings to toggle Closed Loop ON if you wish for the app to automate your insulin.
trans-unit.target:
%1$@ arbeitet mit Closed Loop in der AUS-Position. Ihre Pumpe und CGM werden weiterhin in Betrieb sein, aber Ihr Basalinsulin wird sich nicht automatisch anpassen.
Tippen Sie auf Einstellungen, um Closed Loop EIN umzuschalten, wenn Sie möchten, dass die App Ihr Insulin automatisiert.
trans-unit.note: Green closed loop OFF message (1: app name)

trans-unit.id: %1$@ is operating with Closed Loop in the ON position. Your last loop was successful within the last 5 minutes.
trans-unit.source: %1$@ is operating with Closed Loop in the ON position. Your last loop was successful within the last 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: %1$@ arbeitet mit Closed Loop in der EIN-Position. Ihr letzter Loop war innerhalb der letzten 5 Minuten erfolgreich.
trans-unit.note: Green closed loop ON message (1: app name)
